name: Rock Leone
text:
3 "Beyblade" monsters
When this card is Fusion Summoned; you can summon 1 "Beytarget" (Warrior/EARTH/Level 4/ ATK 1000 / DEF 1000) token on your opponent’s side of the field. Other "Beyblade" monsters deal piercing battle damage. If you use this card as a Fusion Material Monster, it can be all materials for the Fusion Summon of a "Beyblade" card. If this card is sent to the GY, add 1 "Metal Fusion" from your GY to your hand. You can return 1 "Beyblade" monster from your field to your hand; Special Summon this card. You can only Special Summon "Rock Leone" once per turn this way.
